name: phonegap_webpack_angular4_typescript
description: Quick start with phonegap & webpack & angular4 & typescript & sass

scripts.build_prod_android: rm -r -d -f ./platforms && rm -r -d -f ./plugins && npm install && npm update && npm run phonegap_init_android && npm run build_only_webpack_prod
scripts.build_dev_android: rm -r -d -f ./platforms && rm -r -d -f ./plugins && npm install && npm update && npm run phonegap_init_android && npm run build_only_webpack_dev
scripts.build_prod_ios: rm -r -d -f ./platforms && rm -r -d -f ./plugins && npm install && npm update && npm run phonegap_init_ios && npm run build_only_webpack_prod
scripts.build_dev_ios: rm -r -d -f ./platforms && rm -r -d -f ./plugins && npm install && npm update && npm run phonegap_init_ios && npm run build_only_webpack_dev
scripts.phonegap_init_android: phonegap platform add android@6.1.2 --save && phonegap platform add browser --save
scripts.phonegap_init_ios: phonegap platform add ios@latest --save && phonegap platform add browser --save
scripts.phonegap_rebuild_ios: phonegap platform remove ios && phonegap platform add ios@latest --save && open -a Xcode platforms/ios/MY_PROJECT_NAME.xcworkspace
scripts.sign_apk: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore MY_KEYSTORE_NAME.keystore platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-armv7-release-unsigned.apk MY_PROJECT_NAME && mv -f platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-armv7-release-unsigned.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-armv7-release-signed.apk && zipalign -f -v 4 platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-armv7-release-signed.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-armv7-release-signed-aligned.apk && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore MY_PROJECT_NAME.keystore platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-x86-release-unsigned.apk MY_PROJECT_NAME && mv -f platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-x86-release-unsigned.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-x86-release-signed.apk && zipalign -f -v 4 platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-x86-release-signed.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-x86-release-signed-aligned.apk
scripts.prod_apk_android: npm run build_prod_android && npm run build_anroid_release && npm run sign_apk

author: mixal_bl4
